name: Five Stones
description:
This is my first game project to learn Unreal game engine.

The gameplay mechanic is based off Five Stones (thus the title), a classic childhood game where you toss a stone, grab another and quickly catch the former before it falls! You should possess all five stones to win.

In this game, you play as a hungry cat, out to snatch foods at the night market.

Controls: WASD to move. Escape to pause. H for help.

***Gameplay is buggy, but I just want to put this out for now.
